mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion ( ftc_siefore, ftn_idfondo, ftc_fondo, ftn_id_conciliacion, ftd_feh_conciliacion, ftc_folio, ftc_cve_solicitud, ftn_origen_aportacion, ftn_importe, ftn_num_cta_invdual, ftc_nss, ftc_curp, ftn_tipo_aportacion, ftc_rfc_cte, ftn_ref_subcta_apovol, ftn_vigente, ftn_salod_sub_rcv, ftn_id_mov, ftn_excluir, ftd_feh_cre, ftc_usu_cre, ftd_feh_act, ftc_usu_act ) WITH TAB_CONCILIADOS AS ( SELECT * FROM ttafoavol_conciliacion concilia WHERE to_char(CONCILIA.FTD_FEH_CONCILIACION,'YYYYMMDD') between to_char(#{fechaInicio},'YYYYMMDD') and to_char(#{fechaFin},'YYYYMMDD') and concilia.ftn_origen_aportacion = 845 and concilia.FTN_ESTATUS_TRAMITE = 968 and concilia.FTN_REG_CONCILIADO = 1 and concilia.FTC_FOLIO_ARCH_CONT is null and concilia.FTN_MOV_GENERADO = 0 ), TAB_VIGENCIA AS ( SELECT * FROM ttafogral_ind_cta_indv cta_ind WHERE cta_ind.ftc_vigencia = 1 AND cta_ind.ffn_id_config_indi = 2 AND cta_ind.fcc_valor_ind = 1 AND cta_ind.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL IN (SELECT FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL FROM TAB_CONCILIADOS) ), TAB_SALDOS AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct FTC_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL, SUM(FTN_DISP_ACCIONES) FTN_DISP_ACCIONES, 1 ftn_salod_sub_rcv FROM TTAFOGRAL_BALANCE_MOVS WHERE FCC_TABLA_NCI_MOV in( 'RCV', 'BONO' ,'VIV') AND FTC_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL in (SELECT FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL FROM TAB_VIGENCIA) GROUP BY FTC_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL ) WHERE FTN_DISP_ACCIONES > 0 ) SELECT CASE divecon.ftn_fondo_apovol WHEN 741 THEN 'CP' ELSE 'LP' END AS ftc_siefore, divecon.ftn_fondo_apovol ftn_idfondo, ( SELECT fondo.fcc_valor FROM tccrxgral_cat_catalogo fondo WHERE fondo.fcn_id_cat_catalogo = divecon.ftn_fondo_apovol ) ftc_fondo, concilia.ftn_id_conciliacion ftn_id_conciliacion, concilia.ftd_feh_conciliacion ftd_feh_conciliacion, concilia.ftc_folio ftc_folio, concilia.ftn_cve_solicitud ftc_cve_solicitud, concilia.ftn_origen_aportacion ftn_origen_aportacion, divecon.ftn_monto ftn_importe, concilia.ftn_num_cta_invdual ftn_num_cta_invdual, concilia.ftn_nss ftc_nss, concilia.ftc_curp ftc_curp, concilia.ftn_tipo_aportacion ftn_tipo_aportacion, concilia.ftc_rfc_cte ftc_rfc_cte, divecon.ftn_fondo_apovol ftn_ref_subcta_apovol, 1 ftn_vigente, 1 ftn_salod_sub_rcv, concilia.ftn_id_mov ftn_id_mov, 0 ftn_excluir, sysdate ftd_feh_cre, 'usu' ftc_usu_cre, NULL ftd_feh_act, NULL ftc_usu_act FROM TAB_VIGENCIA vigencia INNER JOIN TAB_CONCILIADOS concilia ON ( vigencia.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL = concilia.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL ) INNER JOIN TTAFOAVOL_DIVERSIF_CONC divecon ON ( divecon.ftn_id_conciliacion = concilia.ftn_id_conciliacion ) INNER JOIN TAB_SALDOS saldos ON ( saldos.ftc_num_cta_invdual = vigencia.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL)
mapper.update: UPDATE ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion SET FTN_EXCLUIR = 1, FTC_USU_ACT = #{usuario,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTD_FEH_ACT = SYSDATE, FTN_NO_CARGO = #{noCargo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE FTN_ID_CIFRAS_LIQUIDACION in( With cifras --Nombre de la subconsulta As( SELECT CIFLIQ.FTN_ID_CIFRAS_LIQUIDACION, CIFLIQ.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL, CIFLIQ.FTC_NSS FTC_NSS, CIFLIQ.FTN_IMPORTE FTN_IMPORTE, ROWNUM FTN_NO_CARGO, CIFLIQ.FTD_FEH_CONCILIACION FTD_FEH_CONCILIACION, CIFLIQ.FTN_EXCLUIR FTN_EXCLUIR FROM ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion CIFLIQ WHERE 1=1 AND FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL = #{cuenta,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by CIFLIQ.FTD_FEH_CONCILIACION, FTN_NO_CARGO) select FTN_ID_CIFRAS_LIQUIDACION from cifras where FTN_NO_CARGO = #{noCargo,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: SELECT 83 ftn_siefore, cifliq.ftc_siefore ftc_siefore, cifliq.ftn_idfondo ftn_idfondo, cifliq.ftc_fondo ftc_fondo, COUNT(*) ftn_no_registros, SUM(cifliq.ftn_importe) ftn_importe FROM ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion cifliq WHERE ftn_idfondo IN ( 742, 744, 743 ) GROUP BY cifliq.ftc_siefore, cifliq.ftn_ref_subcta_apovol, cifliq.ftn_idfondo, cifliq.ftc_fondo UNION SELECT 83 ftn_siefore, cifliq.ftc_siefore, 99999 ftn_idfondo, 'TOTAL:' ftc_fondo, COUNT(*) ftn_no_registros, SUM(cifliq.ftn_importe) ftn_importe FROM ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion cifliq WHERE ftn_idfondo IN ( 742, 744, 743 ) GROUP BY cifliq.ftc_siefore UNION SELECT 82 ftn_siefore, cifliq.ftc_siefore ftc_siefore, cifliq.ftn_idfondo ftn_idfondo, cifliq.ftc_fondo ftc_fondo, COUNT(*) ftn_no_registros, SUM(cifliq.ftn_importe) ftn_importe FROM ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion cifliq WHERE ftn_idfondo = 741 GROUP BY cifliq.ftc_siefore, cifliq.ftn_ref_subcta_apovol, cifliq.ftn_idfondo, cifliq.ftc_fondo UNION SELECT 82 ftn_siefore, cifliq.ftc_siefore, 99999 ftn_idfondo, 'TOTAL:' ftc_fondo, COUNT(*) ftn_no_registros, SUM(cifliq.ftn_importe) ftn_importe FROM ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion cifliq WHERE ftn_idfondo = 741 GROUP BY cifliq.ftc_siefore

SELECT CIFLIQ.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL, CIFLIQ.FTC_NSS FTC_NSS, CIFLIQ.FTN_IMPORTE FTN_IMPORTE, ROWNUM FTN_NO_CARGO, CIFLIQ.FTD_FEH_CONCILIACION FTD_FEH_CONCILIACION, CIFLIQ.FTN_EXCLUIR FTN_EXCLUIR FROM ttafoavol_cifras_liquidacion CIFLIQ where FTN_EXCLUIR = 1
